original_text: Listen to this, King Agrippa! I was travelling along the road at midday. Suddenly I saw a very bright light in the sky. It was much brighter than the sun. It shone all round me and also round the men who were with me.
korean_text: 왕이여 정오가 되어 길에서 보니 하늘로부터 해보다 더 밝은 빛이 나와 내 동행들을 둘러 비추는지라

sentences.original_text: I was travelling along the road at midday.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 한낮에 길을 따라 여행하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Suddenly I saw a very bright light in the sky.
sentences.korean_translation: 갑자기 나는 하늘에 매우 밝은 빛을 보았습니다.

sentences.original_text: It was much brighter than the sun.
and also round the men who were with me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나와 함께 있던 사람들 주위에도 비췄습니다.
